;Xinhua News Agency, Shanghai, December 1,   ( Reporter Mei Changwei) Xi Jinping, General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, President of the State, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission, inspected the East China Sea Region Headquarters of the Armed Police Coast Guard Corps on November 29, emphasizing the need to thoroughly implement the spirit of the 20th National Congress of the Party and grasp the characteristics of the construction and application of the Coast Guard force. laws and improve maritime rights protection and law enforcement capabilities.

;Saturday, December 2, 2023
; ;

;Looking at China’s economic landscape, the Yangtze River Delta region accounts for 4% of the country’s land area and gathers about 17% of the country’s population, creating Accounting for nearly a quarter of the country's total economic output, it is one of the regions with the most active economy, the highest degree of openness, and the strongest innovation capabilities.

;

;On November 30, General Secretary Xi Jinping hosted a symposium in Shanghai to further promote the integrated development of the Yangtze River Delta and delivered an important speech, requiring the Yangtze River Delta to "further enhance its innovation capabilities, industrial competitiveness, and development capabilities. Take the lead in forming a new pattern of reform and opening up at a higher level."

;

;On November 5, 2018, at the opening ceremony of the first China International Import Expo held in Shanghai, General Secretary Xi Jinping solemnly announced: "Support the integrated development of the Yangtze River Delta region and elevate it to a national strategy", empowering the Yangtze River Delta The important historical mission of the Yangtze River Delta has injected strong momentum into the integrated development of the Yangtze River Delta.

;

;Since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, General Secretary Xi Jinping has given a series of important speeches and important instructions on the integrated development of the Yangtze River Delta, clearly pointing out the major missions, key tasks, methods and paths, and fundamentals of the integrated development of the Yangtze River Delta. Guarantee points the way forward and provides fundamental guidance for promoting the integrated development of the Yangtze River Delta.

;

;Keeping in mind General Secretary Xi Jinping’s instructions, the Yangtze River Delta region closely adheres to “the strong and active growth pole of national development, a high-quality development model area, the first leading area to basically realize modernization, a regional integrated development demonstration area, and a new highland for reform and opening up” ” strategic positioning, firmly grasp the primary task of high-quality development, and strive to write a new chapter in the Yangtze River Delta of Chinese-style modernization.

;

;;“We must have a deep understanding of the status and role of the Yangtze River Delta region in the country’s economic and social development”;

;

;On November 8, with a start order, A train loaded with power transmission and distribution equipment, construction machinery, optical instruments and other goods slowly drove out from Shanghai Railway Minhang Station. The train will go south along the Shanghai-Kunming Railway, exit from Mohan Port in Yunnan, and head to Vientiane, Laos along the China-Laos Railway.

;

;During the Sixth China International Import Expo, the 2023 Yangtze River Delta G60 Science and Technology Innovation Corridor High-Quality Development Elements Docking Conference was held in Shanghai. Nearly a thousand participants witnessed the "China-Laos Train-G60" from the video "No. 1" international freight train launching ceremony.

;

;The G60 Science and Technology Innovation Corridor in the Yangtze River Delta, which originated in Songjiang District, Shanghai, not only continues to expand in geographical space, but also improves the quality and capacity of the innovation ecology and collaboration network. In the past five years, the number of high-tech enterprises in the G60 Science and Technology Innovation Corridor has increased from 1/12 to 1/8 in the country, and the added value of strategic emerging industries has increased from 11.5% to 15% of GDP...

;

;Long The Triangle, a fertile land for development in eastern China with an area of ​​about 358,000 square kilometers, plays an important role in the country's overall modernization drive and all-round opening up.

;

;While working in Zhejiang and Shanghai, Comrade Xi Jinping thought deeply about and actively promoted the integrated development of the Yangtze River Delta. Entering the new era, what kind of mission should this region bear in the overall development of the country? General Secretary Xi Jinping has carefully planned from the perspective of the overall situation and pressed the "fast forward button" for the integrated development of the Yangtze River Delta.

;

;In May 2014, General Secretary Xi Jinping emphasized during his inspection in Shanghai that "continue to improve the cooperation and coordination mechanism in the Yangtze River Delta region" and "strive to promote the first and integrated development of the Yangtze River Delta region."

;

;On November 5, 2018, General Secretary Xi Jinping delivered a keynote speech at the opening ceremony of the first China International Import Expo, announcing that "we will support the integrated development of the Yangtze River Delta region and elevate it to a national strategy, and strive to implement new development concepts." , build a modern economic system, promote deepening reforms from a higher starting point and a higher level of opening up to the outside world, and cooperate with the construction of the "Belt and Road", the coordinated development of Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei, the development of the Yangtze River Economic Belt, and the construction of the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area to improve China's "Reform and Opening Up Spatial Layout" has opened a new chapter in the integrated development of the Yangtze River Delta.

;

; During a subsequent inspection in Shanghai, General Secretary Xi Jinping put forward clear requirements for the development of Shanghai and the Yangtze River Delta: "We must further play a leading role in promoting higher-quality integrated development of the Yangtze River Delta, and transform the Yangtze River Delta into If the article on integrated development is well done, it will become a strong and active growth pole for my country's development."

;

;Start the layout and take action.

;

;In the past five years, General Secretary Xi Jinping has visited the Yangtze River Delta region for many inspections and surveys, chaired a series of relevant meetings, and provided guidance at the critical stage of the integrated development of the Yangtze River Delta.

;

;Plan before taking action. Formulating the "Outline of the Yangtze River Delta Regional Integrated Development Plan" is a task of strategic significance.

;

;On May 13, 2019, General Secretary Xi Jinping presided over a meeting of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee to review this planning outline. The meeting pointed out that the integrated development of the Yangtze River Delta has a great regional driving and demonstration effect. It must closely adhere to the two keys of "integration" and "high quality" to drive the development of the entire Yangtze River Economic Belt and East China and form a high-quality development region. cluster.

;

;On November 3 of the same year, General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out during an inspection in Shanghai that the three provinces and one city in the Yangtze River Delta should enhance their overall awareness and concept, and implement the "Outline of the Yangtze River Delta Regional Integrated Development Plan". Focus on key areas, key regions, major projects, and major platforms to complete the article on integrated development.

;

;On August 20, 2020, a symposium hosted by General Secretary Xi Jinping with the theme of solidly promoting the integrated development of the Yangtze River Delta was held in Hefei, Anhui.

;

;This is the first time that General Secretary Xi Jinping has held a symposium on this major strategy to make important arrangements since the integrated development of the Yangtze River Delta was elevated to a national strategy. The General Secretary spoke highly of the progress made since the implementation of the Yangtze River Delta integrated development strategy, and clearly pointed out that “in the face of severe and complex situations, to better promote the integrated development of the Yangtze River Delta, we must have a deep understanding of the Yangtze River Delta region’s position in the country’s economic and social development. and function”.

;

;At this meeting, General Secretary Xi Jinping made an important conclusion: "In general, a new situation in the integrated development of the Yangtze River Delta is taking shape."

;

;My sincere entrustment and deep expectations. At every important stage and key link, General Secretary Xi Jinping personally takes the lead and promotes the integrated development of the Yangtze River Delta in depth.

;

;——Clench your fingers into a fist and use your respective advantages to form a combined force.

;

;How can the three provinces and one city in the Yangtze River Delta integrate their own development into the overall coordinated development, achieve coordinated development, organic integration, and form an overall synergy?

;

;“Allowing the smooth flow of factors in a wider range will help give full play to the comparative advantages of each region, achieve a more reasonable division of labor, gather stronger synergy, and promote high-quality development.” General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out the direction.

;

;Through a new energy vehicle, we can observe the logic of the Yangtze River Delta's dislocated development and gathering momentum to become stronger.

;

;Shanghai locally provides "brains" composed of chips, software, etc.; to Changzhou, Jiangsu, about 200 kilometers to the west, it provides power batteries; to Ningbo, Zhejiang, more than 200 kilometers to the south, it provides integrated die-casting Machine...

;

;In the Yangtze River Delta, through the coordinated development of industrial clusters, a new energy vehicle manufacturer can supply the required supporting parts within a 4-hour drive, forming a "modern industrial system" that embodies the characteristics of the industry. 4-hour industrial circle”.

;

;——Key breakthroughs have been made, and the integration process continues to accelerate.

;

;On September 28 this year, the second intercity high-speed railway from Nanjing to Shanghai, the Shanghai-Nanjing Coastal High-speed Railway, was officially put into operation. This high-speed railway connects seven top 100 counties (cities and districts) like Jurong, Jintan, Wujin, Jiangyin, Zhangjiagang, Changshu and Taicang, bringing new momentum and imagination to regional development.

;

;The high-speed railway mileage exceeds 6,600 kilometers, and all prefecture-level cities in the land area are accessible by high-speed trains; the highway network is 16,700 kilometers; a total of more than 500,000 5G base stations have been built; the public service co-construction and sharing mechanism continues to improve... …The distance in time, space and psychology is getting closer and closer, and development opportunities are like endless streams of water.

;

;——Exerting practical results and continuously improving the cooperation mechanism.

;

;Unveiling! At the end of July this year, the Yangtze River Delta Ecological Green Integrated Development Demonstration Zone ushered in the establishment of the country's first cross-provincial high-tech industrial development zone. The Demonstration Zone High-tech Zone covers an area of ​​19.54 square kilometers and will focus on the development of three strategic emerging industries: digital industry, intelligent manufacturing, and green new materials, as well as two characteristic industries: headquarters economy and green science and technology innovation services.

;

;“The state-supported demonstration zone ‘does not break administrative affiliations and breaks administrative boundaries’, which has become the most distinctive advantage of the demonstration zone in creating a cross-provincial high-tech zone.” Executive Committee of the Yangtze River Delta Ecological Green Integrated Development Demonstration Zone Zhu Zhengwei, Minister of the Ministry of Business and Industrial Development, said that the demonstration zone high-tech zone will integrate cross-regional scientific and technological innovation resources and build a regional integrated modern industrial system.

;

;Thanks to the in-depth advancement of integration, the Yangtze River Delta economy has shown strong vitality and resilience.

;

;In the first three quarters of this year, the total GDP of the Yangtze River Delta exceeded 22.1 trillion yuan, accounting for an increase in the proportion of the country's total GDP compared with the same period in 2022. The economic growth rates of the three provinces and one city all exceeded the national average.

;

;;“Close to the two keywords of integration and high quality to do a good job in key tasks”;

;

;“Close to the two keywords of integration and high quality We must grasp key tasks, work hard, and work hard to promote the integrated development of the Yangtze River Delta and continue to achieve results."

;

;In August 2020, General Secretary Xi Jinping chaired a conference to solidly promote the integration of the Yangtze River Delta in Hefei, Anhui. During the development symposium, it was pointed out that breakthroughs should be made around key areas and regions, and the integration process should be accelerated from point to point.

;

;The buildings are colorful and surrounded by green water. In Jinze Town, Qingpu District, in the western suburbs of Shanghai, more than 100 buildings in Huawei's Qingpu R&D Center have all been capped and are currently being fully renovated.

;

;Huawei Qingpu R&D Center is a key project in the Yangtze River Delta ecological green integrated development demonstration zone spanning Shanghai, Jiangsu and Zhejiang. It combines modern workplaces with green ecology to create Huawei's global innovation base.

;

;“In the construction of the demonstration zone, ecological green is the background color, innovative economy is the bright color, and integrated system innovation is the fine color.” Zhang Zhongwei, deputy director of the Executive Committee of the Yangtze River Delta Integration Demonstration Zone, said that as the Yangtze River Delta As a pioneer and breakthrough in the national strategy of integrated development, since the establishment of the demonstration zone, a total of 136 practical and effective institutional innovations have been formed, 38 of which have been replicated and promoted nationwide.

;

;You can see the whole thing by looking at one spot, and you can see the whole situation from a corner. Bearing in mind General Secretary Xi Jinping’s instructions, we will expand our horizons from the demonstration area to the entire Yangtze River Delta region and pursue higher-quality integrated development.

;

;——Promote the mutual promotion and joint development of regional market integration and wider opening-up, and actively explore paths to form a new development pattern.

;

;“The Yangtze River Delta region must take advantage of its rich talent pool, high level of science and technology, developed manufacturing industry, relatively complete industrial and supply chains, and large market potential to actively explore ways to form a new development pattern.” Xi Jinping The General Secretary pointed out the direction for the Yangtze River Delta to build a new development pattern.

;

;This year marks the tenth anniversary of the construction of my country’s free trade zone. The Yangtze River Delta region, including Shanghai, is one of the earliest and most concentrated areas where free trade zones were launched nationwide. The Shanghai Free Trade Zone is the first to build a "single window" for international trade in Shanghai, supporting data processing for more than a quarter of the country's goods trade volume; Jiangsu's biopharmaceutical industry output value will reach 500 billion yuan in 2022, ranking among the top in the country, of which the Free Trade Zone will contribute half ; Zhejiang Free Trade Zone, which does not produce "a drop of oil", relies on institutional innovation to build a full oil and gas industry chain; Anhui Free Trade Zone explores reform measures such as "one industry, one certificate, one code" for business establishment, and the time limit for processing "one license" approval matters The average compression is more than 85%...

;

;——Intensify efforts in scientific and technological research and bravely be the pioneer of my country's scientific and technological and industrial innovation.

;

;“The innovation and development initiative must be firmly in our own hands”;

;

;“We must support the innovation and development of a group of small, medium and micro technology-based enterprises”;

;< p>;"We must further lay a solid foundation for innovation, accelerate the transformation of scientific and technological achievements, accelerate the cultivation of emerging industries, and persevere and work hard for a long time"...

;

;For the integrated development of the Yangtze River Delta, General Secretary Xi Jinping has always emphasized the need to firmly Seize the important engine of "innovation".

;

;In the middle of this year, the "Zuchongzhihao" quantum computing cloud platform was officially launched in Hefei, Anhui and is open to the world. It has become the first international cloud platform with the potential to achieve quantum superiority on the superconducting quantum route.

;

;The developer of "Zuchongzhihao" is the Hefei National Research Center for Microscale Physical Sciences at the University of Science and Technology of China. In recent years, scientific researchers here have cooperated with dozens of scientific research institutions in the Yangtze River Delta, such as the Shanghai Institute of Technical Physics of the Chinese Academy of Sciences and the Jiangnan Institute of Computing Technology, and have continued to tackle quantum technology by displaying their respective strengths.

;

;“Shanghai and the Yangtze River Delta region must not only provide high-quality products, but also provide high-level scientific and technological supplies to support high-quality development across the country.” The requirements put forward by General Secretary Xi Jinping have inspired scientific researchers in the Yangtze River Delta to explore March forward bravely on the road to the unknown world.

;

;——From institutional innovation to legal protection, improve the market-oriented, legal and international business environment, and accelerate the creation of a new highland for reform and opening up.

;

;General Secretary Xi Jinping emphasized that “it is necessary to improve the business environment in line with world-class standards and attract talents and enterprises at home and abroad to settle down with an open, service, innovative and efficient development environment.”

;

;On June 15th, the contract was signed; on August 15th, construction started; on November 15th, the equipment was installed; on December 28th, it is expected to be put into production. In the Haimen Economic and Technological Development Zone, standing in front of the main factory building that has been basically completed, Shen Bing, the person in charge of the Nantong project of Shanghai Electric Group, listed several key points in time for investing in and building a factory there.

;

;A good business environment attracts talents and projects, and promotes high-quality regional economic development.

;

;At present, the Yangtze River Delta region has achieved the "four unifications" of market access registration standards, service specifications, information sharing, and innovation pace. The identity of business entities is online "one-time verification, universal across the entire network" and electronic business Licenses can be shared and reused; the time limit for starting a business has been accelerated to an average of 0.85 days, reaching the level of OECD countries; the total number of business entities has increased to 35.36 million, with an average annual growth rate of 8%.

;

;——Seek more benefits for people’s livelihood, address more concerns about people’s livelihood, and make up for the shortcomings of people’s livelihood in integrated development.

;

;Satisfying the people’s yearning for a better life is the original intention of the integrated development of the Yangtze River Delta and the mission to create the future.

;

;"Promote the convenient sharing of basic public services" and "take the lead in realizing 'same-city treatment' in terms of transportation, tourism, cultural experience, etc." General Secretary Xi Jinping's requirements for the integrated development of the Yangtze River Delta are full of profound meaning. Strong feelings about people's livelihood.

;

;Go out at eight o'clock every day, arrive at Kunshan Huaqiao Station of Shanghai Metro Line 11 at 8:15, take 6 subway stops to Shanghai Circuit Station, and then take the bus for 10 minutes. Before nine o'clock, Zhang Huanhuan showed up at the office in Jiading, Shanghai on time.

;

;Zhang Huanhuan is a native of Huzhou, Zhejiang. He currently lives in Huaqiao Town, Kunshan City, Jiangsu Province, and works in Jiading District, Shanghai. He is a standard "Yangtze River Delta native". As the integrated development of the Yangtze River Delta has become a national strategy, Suzhou Rail Transit Line 11, which started in Suzhou Industrial Park, "joined" with Shanghai Metro Line 11 in Huaqiao and opened for operation in June this year. The time and space distance in the Yangtze River Delta is getting closer and closer.

;

;In the past five years, three provinces and one city have taken the lead in exploring the direct settlement of outpatient medical expenses across provinces; the "one code pass" for rail transit has enabled easy access by scanning codes in 10 cities in the Yangtze River Delta; 140 government services items have been opened on 41 Across provinces and cities, 37 types of high-frequency electronic licenses, such as ID cards, driving licenses, and driving licenses, can be shared and recognized...

;

;One map for planning, one network for transportation, and one chapter for approval. All-in-one people's livelihood card, residents are one family... The Yangtze River Delta is moving from "you are you, I am me" to "you are me, I am you", and now it is accelerating towards "you are me, I am you".

;

;;Creating a “strong and active growth pole for national development”;

;

;At the end of November, despite the sudden drop in temperature, the Chuanshan Port area of ​​Zhoushan Port in Ningbo, Zhejiang was still busy Scene: There are many cranes along the wharf, trucks are shuttled back and forth in the port area, ocean-going ships that have completed loading and unloading operations are setting sail, and sea-rail intermodal trains loaded with cargo are leaving the port area.

;

;In the first three quarters of this year, as the world's largest port in terms of cargo throughput, Ningbo Zhoushan Port has completed a cumulative cargo throughput of 1.015 billion tons, a year-on-year increase of 5.85%, providing services for stabilizing the industrial chain supply chain and serving the new development pattern. Strong support.

;

;On March 29, 2020, General Secretary Xi Jinping drove to the No. 2 container berth of Chuanshan Port Area and inspected the on-site container operation scene at the terminal in the rain to understand the operation of the port.

;

;General Secretary Xi Jinping emphasized that Ningbo Zhoushan Port plays an important role in national strategies such as the joint construction of the "Belt and Road", the development of the Yangtze River Economic Belt, and the integrated development of the Yangtze River Delta, and is a "hard core" force.

;

;Facing the busy main waterway of the Pacific Ocean, the Yangtze River Delta now has Shanghai and Ningbo-Zhoushan Port as the core, with 16 ports including Nanjing, Hangzhou, and Suzhou as the backbone. The overall pattern of port groups with joint development of other ports has basically formed. , the container throughput of the Yangtze River Delta ports will account for approximately 38% of the country's total in 2022.

;

;“Putting the integrated development of the Yangtze River Delta in the overall national regional development strategy for overall planning, it closely links the strong and active growth pole of national development, the high-quality development model area, the first and basically realized modernization leading area, Strategic positioning as a regional integrated development demonstration zone and a new highland for reform and opening up." General Secretary Xi Jinping hit the nail on the head.

;

;In-depth research, deep thinking, and long-term planning.

;

;“Take the lead in forming a new development pattern”, “Bravely be the pioneer of my country’s science and technology and industrial innovation”, “Accelerate the creation of a new highland for reform and opening up” - In August 2020, General Secretary Xi Jinping solidly promoted the integration of the Yangtze River Delta Clear requirements were put forward at the symposium on cultural development.

;

;In June 2021, the "Opinions of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China   The State Council on Supporting Zhejiang's High-Quality Development and Construction of a Common Wealth Demonstration Zone" was released; in July of the same year, the "Opinions of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China   The State Council on Supporting Zhejiang's High-Quality Development and Construction of Common Prosperity Demonstration Zone" "Opinions on Pudong New Area's High-level Reform and Opening Up to Create a Leading Area for Socialist Modernization Construction" was released... The Party Central Committee made overall arrangements and gave the Yangtze River Delta a heavier task and a higher mission.

;

;General Secretary Xi Jinping profoundly pointed out: "The integrated development of the Yangtze River Delta is not a day's work. We must have historical patience and a sense of urgency to seize the day, and plan for the long term while working in the present." ."

;

;Facing the future, the strategic position of the Yangtze River Delta in the overall development of the country will become more prominent, and the task of breaking through will become more arduous. How to further promote the integrated development of the Yangtze River Delta and move towards a better future? This is a question of development and of the times.

;

;General Secretary Xi Jinping emphasized: "The three provinces, one city and relevant departments must follow the decisions and arrangements of the Party Central Committee, have the courage to take responsibility, take the initiative, and make bold breakthroughs."

;

;Carrying high expectations and undertaking major missions , the three provinces and one city will keep in mind the instructions and move forward.

;

;Go deep into key areas and regions to make breakthroughs——

;

;In 2016, on the occasion of the third anniversary of the operation of the Shanghai Free Trade Zone, General Secretary Xi Jinping made important instructions: “Boldly try, boldly enter, Make independent reforms and strive to obtain more institutional innovation results that can be replicated and promoted, and further demonstrate the role of a test field for comprehensively deepening reforms and expanding opening up."

;

;The high-standard construction of the Lingang New Area of ​​the Shanghai Pilot Free Trade Zone is an important step in promoting An important starting point for the integrated development of the Yangtze River Delta. General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out that it is necessary to continue to do a good job in the construction of the Lingang New Area of ​​the Shanghai Pilot Free Trade Zone and give full play to the role of the experimental field.

;

;To promote high-quality economic development in the Yangtze River Delta region, key areas and industries are important traction.

;

;In August 2020, at the symposium on solidly promoting the integrated development of the Yangtze River Delta, General Secretary Xi Jinping clearly pointed out: "We must give full play to the advantages of the digital economy, accelerate the digitalization and intelligent transformation of industries, and improve the industrial chain supply chain Stability and competitiveness."

;

;In September this year, the Yangtze River Delta (Wuhu) Intelligent Computing Center was inaugurated and put into operation in Wuhu City, Anhui Province, planning to build 3000P (1P is approximately equal to 1000 trillion calculations per second) Intelligent computing power will deepen the application of artificial intelligence through the deep integration of computing power and industry, promote digital industrialization and industrial digitization, and help the development of the digital economy in the Yangtze River Delta region.

;

;"Join hands to build a science and technology innovation community in the Yangtze River Delta", "Strive to build a world-class industrial cluster for new energy vehicles and intelligent connected vehicles", "Promote the coordinated development of the three provinces and one city free trade pilot zone"... In June this year, The 2023 symposium of major leaders in the Yangtze River Delta region was held in Hefei. The meeting proposed that the three provinces and one city will deepen collaborative cooperation in more key areas and key regions and promote the implementation of more major platforms and major projects to achieve results.

;

;Improving policy coordination and gathering stronger synergy—

;

;How to improve policy coordination in the Yangtze River Delta region?

;

;General Secretary Xi Jinping made a clear request: "Break administrative barriers and improve policy coordination with integrated ideas and measures."

;

;In September 2022, at the Yangtze River Delta Market Supervision Joint Meeting held in Shanghai, the four places in the Yangtze River Delta comprehensively benchmarked to create a world-class business environment and jointly signed the "Integration of the Market Access System in the Yangtze River Delta Region" Construction Cooperation Agreement.

;

;This means that the Yangtze River Delta region will be the first to complete the "four unifications" in the field of market access, namely unified registration standards, unified service specifications, unified information sharing, and unified innovation pace. The construction of a unified market in the Yangtze River Delta has taken a step forward. Take substantial steps.

;

;The "Yangtze River Delta Regional Collaborative Innovation Index 2022" report shows that the Yangtze River Delta Regional Collaborative Innovation Index in 2022 has increased nearly 1.5 times compared with 2011, with an average annual growth rate of 9.47%.

;
